title: Not Praying in the Masjid due to Flu - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: is that he has the flu and he has a sinus and his headache so is it permissible for him to pray at home no it is not permissible to for you to pray at home unless you have a big problem and it's really difficult for you flu comes and goes like everybody else but when you have a serious problem that may prolong your illness or may cause you a lot of hardship in this case you may pray at home
